name: Torque [Beta 0.7.1] : Standard Edition
description:
Drive through deserts, forests, even the OCEAN in Torque. A Physics-Based driving game. Race through levels without falling off cliffs to your death, that isn't fun, is it?

Torque is in a Slow Development Stage where we are working on new content, but are focusing our time on a new project. This doesn't mean the end by any means!

= Update Notes =

Version 0.7.1

Improved UI, Bug Fixes, Quality Control

NOTE: Have any Issues or Questions? Leave a comment! I'll get back to you quickly!
